column4: I need help insalling my wireless drivers via vnc i have tryed and failed now i am fustrated
I have the driver and i have ndiswrapper i just cant install it so can i get some one to vnc me and install for me
zzzzzzzzzzz i wish some would help me with my wireless
I am new to linux and thats jiberish to me
I dont get none of it i am vary fustraited
i have been trying all day
Now i just want a vnc and some one to SHOW me how to do it
copy the driver's files into a directory, cd into that directory in the terminal, then type "sudo ndiswrapper -i ./drivername.inf"
do you have libssl0.9.8 and libssl-dev installed?
i am useing Unreal3.2.7 i didnt know if you got the last one or not
I saw, but I haven't used unreal since about a year ago
im makeing it now to see if it works
that worked thank you vary mutch
